hadiths.text: Nafi' reported Ibn 'Umar as saying:I do not know this but from Allah's Apostle (ﷺ) who said: Every intoxicant is Khamr and every Khamr is forbidden

chapter.ara-name: باب بَيَانِ أَنَّ كُلَّ مُسْكِرٍ خَمْرٌ وَأَنَّ كُلَّ خَمْرٍ حَرَامٌ
chapter.eng-name: Every intoxicant is Khamr and all Khamr is Haram
